name: Birthday gift mystery
description:
Small game jam game. Submitted to the Quarter Annual DG Jam V3. Hosted by Driftwoodgaming. Checkem ooouuuuttttt!

I was aiming for making a few more machanics but my computer died mid jam. I was able to get an upgrade and rock on but had to scrap a lot. 

I am aiming for a fun "bug free" experience of retro gaming fun. Machinically this is an escape room/ scavenger hunt with multiple endings and 7 unlockable achievements.

Help Charlie figure out what his parents are getting him for his birthday!

Catagory: Detective, Time from 5-15 minutes to complete.
